org.gradle.api.tasks

Interface TaskCaching


  • @Incubating
public interface TaskCaching
    Configuration for caching task outputs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void useCacheFactory(org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.cache.TaskOutputCacheFactory factory)
      Use the give task output cache factory.
      void useLocalCache()
      Use the default local directory cache.
      void useLocalCache(File directory)
      Use a local directory cache in the given directory.

    • Method Detail

      • useLocalCache

        void useLocalCache()
        Use the default local directory cache. The cache directory path defaults to $GRADLE_HOME/task-cache. It can also be overridden via the org.gradle.cache.tasks.directory system property.

      • useLocalCache

        void useLocalCache(File directory)
        Use a local directory cache in the given directory.

      • useCacheFactory

        void useCacheFactory(org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.cache.TaskOutputCacheFactory factory)
        Use the give task output cache factory.
